scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:gen && npm run coverage:html && npm run coverage:view
scripts.docker:up: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=false docker compose -f ../docker-compose.yml --profile quadratic-connection-db --env-file ../.env.docker up -d --wait && sleep 10
scripts.docker:down: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=false docker compose -f ../docker-compose.yml --profile quadratic-connection-db --env-file ../.env.docker down
scripts.docker:test: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=true docker compose kill && npm run docker:up && npm run test && npm run docker:down
